name: Cryomancer
description:
Cryomancer is a precision-platforming game that makes the player use his ice-making skill to pass through a series of challenges!

Controls

Move - AD or Left/Right Arrow
Jump - Space/Up arrow/W
Spawn ice blocks - Left Mouse/E
Spawn freezing spray - Right Mouse/Q
Pause - ESC

Developer Tip - The ice block take some time to start falling, you can use this to your advantage and gain a second jump by spawning right below your feet or jumping on it before it falls.
